article_title: A Good Prognosis for Health-Care Stocks
article_text:
Health care has been big news in recent months, with the implementation of the Affordable Care Act and the struggles of the HealthCare.gov website. It's been a focus for many investors as well, with the health-care sector by far the best performer among nine major stock-market segments over the past year.

For the 12 months ended Jan. 31, health-care stocks in the S&P 500 index returned 33.1%, beating the overall S&P 500's...

twitter.description: Some investment pros expect the health-care sector to follow up a big year in 2013 with more gains. But they warn investors to be aware of the risks of small biotech companies.
twitter.title: A Good Prognosis for Health-Care Stocks

image.alt: Pros Say the Prognosis for Health Stocks and Funds Remains Bright After Big Gains in 2013
